Digaxy helps with moving and logistics services like Home Move, Apartment Move, Office Move, Furniture Delivery, and Donation Pickup. You can also get an instant estimate by entering pickup and drop-off locations, then selecting a vehicle.

Available services include: Home Move, Apartment Move, College Move, Office Move, Furniture Delivery, and Donation Pickup. Commercial moving and retailer deliveries may be available depending on your city coverage.
Simple flow: select your pickup & drop-off, choose your truck/vehicle, then track your driver live with real-time updates during the move/delivery.

To get an instant estimate, share your pickup and drop-off locations and your vehicle type. The estimate is calculated using base fare + travel price (distance) + handling fee (load/unload effort). Taxes are included.
